username.description: username of user whom perform query

include.description: include keywords of this query, will return documents contains all of these keywords

exclude.description: exclude keywords of this query, will return documents not contains these keywords

start.description: for pagination, first index of response, zero-based

rows.description: for pagination, number of documents return in single query

time_start.description: start time of time interval of result, the number of milliseconds since 1970/01/01, -1 when not limit

time_end.description: end time of time interval of result, the number of milliseconds since 1970/01/01, -1 when not limit

order_by.description: return result will order by given value
